highlights: Developed a custom ETL pipeline for Sage 300 CRE for internal migration to BuildOps.
Developed internal form workflows that save hundreds of hours per month.
Cut inefficiencies in IT operations that saved the company tens of thousands of dollars per year.
Supported the Virtual Maintenance Trainer (VMT) projects, a collection of Unity-based virtual world maintenance trainers.

Designed and developed the Operational Readiness Test System (ORTS) for the VMT projects.  Leveraged real-world big data to dynamically construct a virtual ORTS instance based on the relevant VMT project.
Led a small team of developers and managed a business relationship with Lockheed Martin engineers to assist with the development of ORTS for the VMT projects.
Key developer for an internal group of assemblies that increased the overall stability and development speed across all VMT projects.
Networked with local businesses to develop small clientele for web development work.
Redesigned www.masterswoodworkinginc.com leading to an increase in customer acquisition.
Developed contact form workflow for www.citymechanical.com that improved turnaround for new customers.
Ran live recording sessions recording local artists and bands.
In-house Ableton Live expert for music production, taught lessons on the software.
Produced various sound cues that ended up on the shows like Venom Hunters on Discovery Channel.

projects.name: icandrivers
projects.description: A custom driver solution to allow the Holley Tuning Software to run on ARM-based devices.

projects.name: formbro
projects.description: A form platform intended to replace legacy providers with a easy way for non-technical businesses to leverage form workflows.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Recognized for earning a GPA of at least 3.5 in a term while completing at least 6 credits and maintained a cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher.

awards.title: Magna Cum Laude
awards.summary: Recognized for graduating with a cumulative GPA of 3.901-3.999.
